headline: Salesforce Stokes Fight With Veeva by Snagging Drug Customers
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Salesforce Inc. says it’s taking multiple large customers from former partner Veeva Systems Inc. in a mounting rivalry to sell software to the pharmaceutical industry.
